author: Joseph Walker, Jared S. Hopkins
title: Immune system gone haywire doing more damage than covid itself?
description: Immune system gone haywire doing more damage than covid itself? (Top headline, 2nd story, link ) Related stories: How single cough spreads across supermarket... Most New York Coronavirus Cases Came From Europe, Genomes Show... Only 6% actually being detected?…
content:
An immune system gone haywire may be doing more damage than the coronavirus itself in patients with the severest forms of Covid-19, doctors and scientists say, a growing theory that could point the way to potential treatments.
Much remains unknown about the … [+196 chars]
